column5: Does anyone know if Waterford Ponds has frozen over yet or is there still some open water? Any info appreciated.
lots of open water when I was there today
Thanks. I must check it out tomorrow then. Did you fish it at all?
no, was just driving through for work.  Was through there again tonight on my way home, and every pond is icing over now, with snow on the ice
Well I guess I might not head out there tomorrow then. Was gonna go today but hit Bass Pro instead. Thanks for the info.
